Articles.Content: I was thinking about a cool thing this morning... For both my KSP game, and maybe in real life, how cool would a \'Space Station Hotel\' be??? That would be AMAZING!!!!

They have plans for space hotels in the future. I think that a mod maker could make a space hotel mod! (Here is a link to a book about space tourism: http://www.amazon.com/Space-Tourism-Adventures-Earth-Beyond/dp/1441923144/ref=sr_1_3?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1339207347&sr=1-3 Enjoy!)
